short_summary: Placing, Lifting, Removal, Maintaining and Servicing Buoys
description: The Canadian Coast Guard requires services related to placing, lifting, removing, maintaining, and servicing buoys around Prince Edward Island. These navigation aids assist pleasure craft, fishing, and commercial vessels in navigating safely through Canada’s waterways.
full_summary:
# Tender Details
**Title (English)**: Placing, Lifting, Removal, Maintenance, and Servicing of Buoys in Prince Edward Island

**Title (French)**: Mise en place, levage, enlèvement, entretien et service des bouées dans la province de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard

**Reference Number**: cb-65-576509
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: 30005484
**Publication Date**: 2024-06-13
**Closing Date**: 2024-06-28 14:00:00

**Contract Period**: 2024-07-01 to 2026-06-28, with a possible extension by two (2) one-year periods

**Scope of Work**: The Canadian Coast Guard requires services related to the placement, lifting, removal, maintenance, and servicing of buoys around Prince Edward Island. The contractor must inspect all buoys and equipment within 30 days after contract award and report any discrepancies or defects to the Aids to Navigation Operations Office or Project Authority.

**Work Areas**: 

- Grand River East
- Malpeque & Darnley
- Orwell & Vernon
- Pownal
- Upper Cardigan
- West Point

**Security Requirements**: None

**Contact Information**:

- Name: Lana Hunt
- Email: [lana.hunt@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:lana.hunt@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- Phone: (604) 355-0314

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible to participate under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and other trade agreements.

**Attachments**: The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website ([https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)). The attachments include the Request for Proposal (RFP) and Addendum 001.

**Tender Status**: Expired. All inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date. Enquiries received after that time may not be answered.  End of Tender.
